result.value: Fast and flexible nonadiabatic molecular dynamics in Julia!

**Fast and flexible nonadiabatic molecular dynamics in Julia!** 
-  🚗 **Fast:** uses [DifferentialEquations.jl](https://diffeq.sciml.ai/stable/) for efficient dynamics.
-  🪚 **Extensible:** plenty of room for more methods.
- ⚛️ **Transferable:** handles both simple models and atomistic systems.
- 👩‍🏫 **Helpful:** extended documentation with plenty of examples. 
With this package you can generate the initial conditions and perform the dynamics for your nonadiabatic dynamics simulations.
Tight integration with [DifferentialEquations.jl](https://diffeq.sciml.ai/stable/)
makes the implementation of new methods relatively simple since we
build upon an already successful package providing a vast array of features.
We hope that the package will be of use to new students and experienced researchers alike, acting as a tool for learning and for developing new methods.

| **Documentation** | **Build Status** | **License** | |:------------------------------------------------------|:----------------------------------------------- |:-------------------------------- | | [![][docs-img]][docs-url] [![][ddocs-img]][ddocs-url] | [![][ci-img]][ci-url] [![][ccov-img]][ccov-url] | [![][license-img]][license-url] | [ddocs-img]: https://img.shields.io/badge/docs-dev-blue.svg [ddocs-url]: https://nqcd.github.io/NQCDynamics.jl/dev/ [docs-img]: https://img.shields.io/badge/docs-stable-blue.svg [docs-url]: https://nqcd.github.io/NQCDynamics.jl/stable/ [ci-img]: https://github.com/nqcd/NQCDynamics.jl/actions/workflows/CI.yml/badge.svg [ci-url]: https://github.com/nqcd/NQCDynamics.jl/actions/workflows/CI.yml [ccov-img]: https://codecov.io/gh/NQCD/NQCDynamics.jl/branch/main/graph/badge.svg [ccov-url]: https://codecov.io/gh/NQCD/NQCDynamics.jl [license-img]: https://img.shields.io/github/license/NQCD/NQCDynamics.jl [license-url]: https://github.com/NQCD/NQCDynamics.jl/blob/main/LICENSE

Explore the NQCDynamics.jl docs 📚
molecular-dynamics, monte-carlo, nonadiabatic, physics-simulation, quantum-classical, semi-classical

**Merged pull requests:**

**Closed issues:**

## NQCDynamics v0.13.6

[Diff since v0.13.3](https://github.com/NQCD/NQCDynamics.jl/compare/v0.13.3...v0.13.6)


**Merged pull requests:**
- Update compatibilities (#299) (@jamesgardner1421)
- QuantiseDiatomic updates (#300) (@Alexsp32)
- Update documentation with new IO functionality (#301) (@jamesgardner1421)
- New version: 0.13.4 (#309) (@jamesgardner1421)
- Update documenter to v1 and add docs profiling info (#312) (@jamesgardner1421)
- Hokseson (#314) (@Louhokseson)
- Update docs for ring polymers (#315) (@Alexsp32)
- Merge main to my branch (#318) (@Louhokseson)
- added new rescaling method ":vinversion" for SurfaceHopping (#323) (@reinimaurer1)
- Fix failing CI tests (#324) (@Alexsp32)
- Update AdvancedMH.jl wrapper for Monte Carlo sampling.  (#325) (@Alexsp32)
- Frustrated hops (#328) (@reinimaurer1)
- Fix allocation-based unit tests (#336) (@Alexsp32)
- Add OutputInitial DynamicsOutput (#337) (@Alexsp32)

**Closed issues:**
- Metropolis Hastings, Legacy version (#136)
- quantise_diatomic fails for some positions/velocities (#292)
- Installation fails on precompile due to SimpleNonlinearSolve.jl (#308)
- Monte Carlo methods based on AdvancedMH.jl do not provide expected results.  (#320)
